Behaviours
Label switching
Updating the loading label with the tasks that are being completed can create the
perception of progress, reduce user's anxiety and clarify the process. The trigger for
switching labels should be defined on a case-by-case basis. For example, in some
applications it might make more sense to trigger automatically after a certain period of
time, while in others there might be steps in the process that trigger the change.

Faster process is a priority
The first priority of any system that has a time-consuming process is to make this
process faster, and not to just make it more acceptable to the user. So, this component
should be seen as a fallback for the moments where there is no viable route to
increasing the system's speed.
